about.title: about me
content: A little about me: I'm a natural problem solver with a keen interest in all web development technologies.

After working in various fields, I have finally found my true passion in coding just about a year ago. Through many hours of coffee and many cups of studying, ups and downs, self set goals wrestled, I am more than happy to offer my self taught skills, passion and time to use. I'm well experienced in building SEO optimised mobile first applications using best web development practices and technologies. I have just under 1 year of web development experience and I’m always keen to learn new things, tackle new challenges and race with the best solutions. So far I’ve been developing websites, integrated from pdf and psd design, fashioning everything from bottom up:
- creating responsive, mobile first single page and multi page applications
- creating reusable website components and features such as: banners, footers, photo galleries, headers, drop down menus, navigation bars, tables, button features etc
For more information, your questions, suggestions or anything at all please go to the contact section and get in touch.
It was nice having you and I hope you'll enjoy the rest.
